name: Rekap Surat Pesanan Barang
query:
SELECT
	poi.parent as "Purchase Order:Link/Purchase Order:140",
	poi.item_code as "Kode Barang:Link/Item:120",
	poi.item_name as "Item Name::200",
	poi.uom as "Satuan:Link/UOM:80",
	SUM(poi.qty) as "Vol SPB:Float:120",
	COALESCE(pri.received_qty, 0) as "Vol Datang:Float:120",
	COALESCE(pri.qty, 0) as "Vol Diterima:Float:120",
	COALESCE(pri.rejected_qty, 0) as "Vol Ditolak:Float:120",
	COALESCE(pri.description, "") as "Deskripsi::220",
	COALESCE(pri.detail, "") as "Detail::420"
FROM
	`tabPurchase Order Item` poi
LEFT JOIN (SELECT 
    SUM(pri.received_qty) received_qty, 
    SUM(pri.qty) qty, 
    SUM(pri.rejected_qty) rejected_qty, 
    pri.purchase_order, 
    pri.item_code,
    GROUP_CONCAT(pri.description separator ',') description,
    GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(pr.posting_date, ': ', FORMAT(pri.qty, 2)) separator ',') detail
    FROM `tabPurchase Receipt Item` pri 
    INNER JOIN `tabPurchase Receipt` pr ON pr.name = pri.parent
    WHERE pri.docstatus = 1 AND pr.posting_date BETWEEN %(date_from)s AND %(date_to)s
    GROUP BY pri.purchase_order, pri.item_code) pri 
        ON pri.purchase_order = poi.parent AND pri.item_code = poi.item_code
WHERE
	poi.docstatus = 1
GROUP BY
	poi.parent, poi.item_code
ORDER BY
	"Total Commission:Currency:120"
